core.title: Greater Boston Municipal Boundaries
core.shortDescription: Towns and cities within the Metropolitan Area Planning Committee's (MAPC) Inner Core Committee (ICC); geography covers MAPC ICC region; time period is 2017
core.fullDescription:
This data represents a boundary file of 21 towns and cities that fall within MAPC's ICC designation, including Arlington, Belmont, Boston, Brookline, Cambridge, Chelsea, Everett, Lynn, Malden, Medford, Melrose, Milton, Needham, Newton, Quincy, Revere, Saugus, Somerville, Waltham, Watertown, and Winthrop. 
 
 This dataset is part of the LMEC's [Cartography Challenges](https://leventhalmap.org/projects/cartography-challenge).

temporal.temporalNotes: This data represents municipal boundaries as of 2017.

access.title: Greater Boston Municipal Boundaries Zipped Shapefile

ingredients.notes: This data was derived from a dataset of Massachusetts Municipal Boundaries published by MAPC (https://datacommon.mapc.org/browser/datasets/390)

processing.steps:
1. Download Massachusetts Municipal Boundaries dataset from MAPC DataCommon 
 2. Manually remove towns and cities outside of MAPC-designated ICC region
